sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import { Toggle } from "react-powerplug"
import { Radio } from '../src'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"radio"}}>{`Radio`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-state"}}>{`With state`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __codesandbox={`undefined`} __code={`<Toggle>
  {({ on, toggle }) => (
    <Radio selected={on} onSelect={toggle}>
      Click me
    </Radio>
  )}
</Toggle>`} __scope={{props,Toggle,Radio}}>
  <Toggle>
    {({ on, toggle }) => (
      <Radio selected={on} onSelect={toggle}>
        Click me
      </Radio>
    )}
  </Toggle>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"hover"}}>{`Hover`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __codesandbox={`undefined`} __code={`<Radio hover>Click me</Radio>`} __scope={{props,Toggle,Radio}}>
  <Radio hover>Click me</Radio>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"selected"}}>{`Selected`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __codesandbox={`undefined`} __code={`<Radio selected>Selected</Radio>`} __scope={{props,Toggle,Radio}}>
  <Radio selected>Selected</Radio>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"disabled"}}>{`Disabled`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __codesandbox={`undefined`} __code={`<Radio disabled>Disabled</Radio>`} __scope={{props,Toggle,Radio}}>
  <Radio disabled>Disabled</Radio>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"selected-and-disabled"}}>{`Selected and disabled`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __codesandbox={`undefined`} __code={`<Radio selected disabled>
  Disabled
</Radio>`} __scope={{props,Toggle,Radio}}>
  <Radio selected disabled>
    Disabled
  </Radio>
</Playground></MDXTag>
